thread.title: Top 10 quotes to start the New Year with
thread.title_full: Top 10 quotes to start the New Year with

author: MintGenie Team
title: Top 10 quotes to start the New Year with
text: HAPPY NEW YEAR 2024 TOP 10 QUOTES TO START THE NEW YEAR WITH Published By MintGenie Team | 29 Dec, 2023 Ernest Agyemang Yeboah “When you see a new year, see realities and limit fantasies!” Peggy Toney Horton “Whatever has happened in the past year, the New Year brings fresh beginnings.” Auliq Ice “New Beginnings are in order, and you are bound to feel some level of excitement as new chances come your way.” Emilie Coue “Every day, in every way, I am getting better and better.” Carl Bard “Although no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.” Joseph Campbell “The old skin has to be shed before the new one can come.” Charles Lamb “New Year's Day is every man's birthday.” Mehmet Murat ildan “The New Year is a painting not yet painted; a path not yet stepped on; a wing not yet taken off!” Vern McLellan “What the new year brings to you will depend a great deal on what you bring to the new year.” Joanne Raptis “Be like a tree. Stay grounded. Connect with your roots. Turn over a new leaf. Bend before you break. Enjoy your unique natural beauty. Keep growing.” CLICK FOR MORE VISUAL STORIES
